page.title: 10The Old Lewes Race Course
page.content: The stables are built out of brick which is very unusual because they are normally made out wood.Although Mrs Ffitch Heyes has been there for two years there is still a lot of building development going on and to be done. They have plans to build a riding school for professionel riders.Mr Ffitch Heyes has built himself a large bungalow near the stables. Mrs Ffitch Heyes said that one of the main reasons they moved there was because of the good training facilities. The old grandstand is still there,but they have taken away all the benches and it could fall down very soon.They also have two starting gates for two horses in an overgrown ditch.Apart from the bungalow and stables the Old Lewes Race Course looks very delapidated and desolate.
